name: Light of Atlantis - Bosschallenge Demo
description:
Will you be able to finish the boss challenge?

Explore the wondrous depths of the sea to find your way through Atlantis. Control the water level in various rooms and solve puzzles to discover the mysteries of an ancient society.

     

With the boss challenge being currently tested, you'll get an exclusive look into this 2D puzzle-plattformer game in development. Feel free to take part in a quick 3-Minute survey linked at the end of the game - It would be highly appreciated, since the feedback will help us a lot to improve the boss challenge further!

     

Controls

Links

          

Steam coming soon!

Team DrownTown

This game was developed as a project for the Gamesmaster of the HAW Hamburg.

Programming: Alina Fasen, Vincent Krenzke

Art: Luisa Höhne, Simone Mayer

Audio: Alexander Nham
